history.content:
<md>Hey everyone! Political Computer Science (PCS) is recruiting members this semester. We are a project-based organization of students who are passionate about the use of technology and data science to introduce solutions to problems in our legal and political systems. Our projects range from purely researched based projects into current issues to full technical projects that provide innovative solutions. We emphasize community and growth so aside from our semester-long projects, we host professional development workshops, guest speaker events, and fun socials!

If you are interested, check out https://pcs-recruitment.carrd.co for links to our website, recruitment info, the application, and our socials! Here is our recruitment timeline:

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/800969455428829204/933610961833705512/website.png)

Feel free to email us at pcs.berkeley@gmail.com!</md>
history.subject: Join Political Computer Science!
